name: fish-ai
description: Supercharge your command line with LLMs and get shell scripting assistance in Fish. üí™
readme_summary: fish-ai is a Fish shell plugin that integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) to provide AI-powered assistance for shell scripting. It enables users to convert natural language comments into commands, fix broken commands, and get intelligent command autocompletion, all accessible via keyboard shortcuts.
key_features: Convert comments to shell commands
Fix broken shell commands
LLM-powered command autocompletion with fuzzy finder
Configurable via keyboard shortcuts
Supports various LLM providers (Anthropic, Azure OpenAI, Cohere, DeepSeek, GitHub Models, self-hosted)
Easy installation and updates with fisher
Tested on macOS and Linux
Does not interfere with other Fish plugins
primary_use_case: To enhance the Fish shell experience by providing AI-driven assistance for command-line operations, reducing the need to consult documentation or search for command syntax.
cover_image_prompt: A wise, ancient librarian sitting at a grand wooden desk, surrounded by towering shelves of books. In front of the librarian is a single, glowing digital tablet displaying a complex command-line interface. The librarian is using a magical quill that transforms scribbled notes and spoken words (represented by ethereal wisps) into perfectly formed, executable commands on the tablet. Small, subtle icons representing Git, kubectl, and curl float around the desk. The overall mood is one of effortless knowledge and power, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with soft, ambient lighting and a color palette of deep blues and warm wood tones, with the 'fish-ai' logo subtly integrated into the desk design.

name: Android-MCP
description: Lightweight MCP Server for interacting with Android Operating System.
readme_summary: Android-MCP is a lightweight Python server that bridges AI agents with Android devices, enabling them to interact with the operating system and applications through natural language commands. It facilitates tasks like app navigation, UI testing, and automation without requiring traditional computer vision or pre-programmed scripts.
key_features: Native Android Integration via ADB and Accessibility API
Support for any LLM/VLM without fine-tuned CV models
Rich toolset for mobile automation (gestures, text input, shell commands)
Real-time interaction with low latency
Support for Android 10+
primary_use_case: Enabling AI agents to control and automate tasks on Android devices through natural language.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly robot AI, depicted as a disembodied, glowing brain with subtle circuit patterns, is seamlessly connected via a luminous digital thread to a stylized Android smartphone. The AI brain is 'thinking' in abstract shapes and colors that are visually manifesting as actual UI elements and app icons appearing on the phone's screen. Small, translucent data streams flow from the AI to the phone, representing commands like 'tap', 'swipe', and 'type'. The background is a clean, minimalist digital space with subtle code snippets floating around. The overall mood is one of intuitive control and effortless automation. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a vibrant, futuristic color palette.

name: gifcap
description: Capture your screen to a GIF in your browser
readme_summary: gifcap is a client-side, browser-based tool for capturing screen recordings directly into animated GIFs. It requires no installation and operates entirely within the browser, making it accessible and private.
key_features: No installations required, works in modern browsers
100% client-side only, no data uploaded
PWA support for easy integration
Fast GIF rendering with WASM, libimagequant, and gifsicle
Optimized GIF file sizes (frame deduplication, delta detection, lossy encoding)
Record entire screen or select a single window
Intuitive trimming UI
Easy cropping via drag-and-drop
primary_use_case: Quickly and easily creating animated GIF screen recordings directly in the browser without any software installation or server-side processing.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, animated robot holding a vintage film camera, actively filming a computer screen displaying a vibrant, moving scene. The robot is capturing the screen's action, and from the camera's lens, a perfectly formed, looping GIF animation is emerging, glowing slightly. Subtle UI elements like a record button and a trim slider are visible on a small, floating digital panel near the robot. The background is a clean, minimalist workspace with soft, ambient lighting. The overall style should be a 3D isometric illustration with bright, friendly colors, emphasizing ease of use and instant results. The repository name 'gifcap' is subtly integrated into the robot's design or the floating panel.

name: Mole
description: üêπ Dig deep like a mole to optimize you Mac. ÂÉèÈºπÈº†‰∏ÄÊ†∑Ê∑±ÂÖ•ÊåñÊéòÊù•‰ºòÂåñ‰Ω†ÁöÑ Mac
readme_summary: Mole is a command-line utility for macOS designed to deeply clean and optimize your system. It acts as an all-in-one tool, consolidating features found in popular applications like CleanMyMac, AppCleaner, and DaisyDisk, to free up disk space, uninstall applications with their leftovers, and monitor system health.
key_features: All-in-one toolkit (CleanMyMac + AppCleaner + DaisyDisk + Sensei + iStat)
Deep system cleanup (caches, temp files, browser leftovers, junk)
Smart application uninstallation (app bundles, launch agents, settings, caches, logs, leftovers)
Disk insight and optimization (large files, folder display, cache rebuild, swap clean, service refresh)
Live system status monitoring (CPU, GPU, memory, disk, network, battery, proxy)
primary_use_case: System optimization and cleanup for macOS users via a command-line interface.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, stylized mole character, wearing a tiny hard hat and holding a glowing shovel, is actively digging through a cluttered digital landscape representing a Mac's file system. The mole is unearthing large, glowing chunks of 'junk data' (represented as messy, tangled digital debris) and neatly placing them into a clean, organized digital bin. In the background, a clear, simplified dashboard displays real-time system metrics like CPU and memory usage, glowing green. The scene is set in a clean, modern digital environment with subtle circuit board patterns. The mole's digging action visually represents deep system cleaning and optimization. The overall style is a 3D isometric illustration with bright, clean colors and clear visual metaphors.

name: bdh
description: Baby Dragon Hatchling (BDH) ‚Äì Architecture and Code
readme_summary: Baby Dragon Hatchling (BDH) is a novel, biologically inspired large language model architecture that bridges deep learning with neuroscience. It offers a scale-free, locally interacting network of neurons that achieves Transformer-like performance while maintaining full interpretability and theoretical grounding in neural dynamics.
key_features: Scale-free network topology
Locally interacting neuron particles with excitatory/inhibitory dynamics
Hebbian working memory with synaptic plasticity and monosemanticity
GPU-friendly state-space formulation
Interpretable, sparse, and positive activations
Matches GPT-2 scale Transformers in performance
primary_use_case: To provide a new AI architecture that combines the performance of Transformers with the interpretability and biological plausibility of neural systems, enabling deeper understanding of reasoning and generalization in AI.
cover_image_prompt: A wise, ancient tree with roots deeply intertwined with glowing neural pathways, representing the brain's structure. From its branches, digital fruits shaped like language symbols (e.g., 'A', '?', '!') are gently falling into a modern, sleek AI processor. The tree's bark subtly displays the 'BDH' logo. Small, translucent screens around the base of the tree show simplified visualizations of neuron interactions and data flow. The scene is set in a serene, ethereal forest clearing with soft, glowing light emanating from the neural pathways and fruits. The overall mood is one of natural intelligence merging with artificial computation. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with a vibrant, yet harmonious color palette, emphasizing the connection between biological and artificial intelligence.

name: jscamp
description: Contenido y ejercicios del JSCamp InfoJobs
readme_summary: JSCamp is an intensive full-stack JavaScript and web development bootcamp that covers a wide range of technologies from HTML/CSS fundamentals to advanced topics like Node.js, TypeScript, SQL, CI/CD, and Docker. It aims to guide participants through building a complete real-world application from scratch, reinforcing learned concepts.
key_features: Intensive JavaScript and full-stack web development bootcamp
Covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, SQL, CI/CD, Docker
Builds a complete project from scratch step-by-step
Includes video content and exercises on JSCamp.dev
Optional paid certificate with additional benefits
Covers modern JavaScript ecosystem and modern development practices
primary_use_case: To provide a structured and comprehensive learning experience for individuals looking to become proficient in full-stack JavaScript development, culminating in the ability to build and deploy real-world applications.
cover_image_prompt: A vibrant, bustling workshop scene where a skilled artisan is assembling a complex, multi-faceted clockwork device. Gears representing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and Docker are being meticulously placed by the artisan. Glowing lines of code emanate from the artisan's tools, connecting the different components. In the background, a large blueprint displays the finished device, symbolizing a complete web application. Subtle UI elements and data streams flow around the workshop, indicating the digital nature of the craft. The overall mood is one of creation and mastery. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clear, bright lighting and a focus on the intricate details of the assembly process.
